        this.productNumberCode = value;

        final StringBuilder buffer = new StringBuilder();
        append(null, buffer, strategy);
        return buffer.toString();

        appendFields(locator, buffer, strategy);
        strategy.appendEnd(locator, this, buffer);
        return buffer;
    }
